abilities.name: Miraculous Intervention
abilities.rule: The first time this unit’s Celestine model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that Celestine model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Lifewards
abilities.rule: While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.name: Healing Tears
abilities.rule: While this unit contains a Celestine model, in your Command phase, if this unit is below its Starting Strength, either one destroyed Geminae Superia model or up to D3 other Bodyguard models are returned to this unit.
